Symptom:
High Seal leak off pressure 
(Applicable for Dry Gas Seal)
Key_Parameters_to_Check (X-mapped): Last Maint; Overhaul Reports; Trip History; Speed; Suction Pressure; Suction Flow; Suction Valve Opening % or Inlet Guide Vane opening %; Discharge Flow; Balancing Line Pressure; Recycle Valve (Anti-Surge Valve) opening %; Seal Gas Supply Pressure; Seal Gas Supply Flow; Seal Gas Differential Pressure; Barrier Gas Pressure; Barrier Gas Flow
Immediate_Action: Verify seal system DP/setpoints; check vent restriction; plan safe shutdown if leak persists.
Diagnostic_Checks: Check trends + validate instruments; inspect filters/coolers/valves; review vibration spectrum where applicable.
Likely_Root_Causes: Vent restriction / high backpressure; Seal face wear / damage; High seal gas supply pressure / wrong setpoint; Contamination / liquid carryover in seal gas; Reference/barrier/buffer gas control malfunction
